subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ pursuit of Johan Santana showed a flicker of life early Tuesday when the Twins backed off their demand for Ian Kennedy, but Hank Steinbrenner indicated that Minnesota is still asking too much.
snippet: The Yankees’ pursuit of Johan Santana showed a flicker of life early Tuesday when the Twins backed off their demand for Ian Kennedy, but Hank Steinbrenner indicated that Minnesota is still asking too much.
